properties.areaDesc: Owens Valley; Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 8:20AM PST until January 11 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Las Vegas NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph.

* WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and Owens Valley.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM PST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong gusts could create hazardous driving conditions
along Highway 395. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured
objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages
may result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest gusts are expected to remain
west of Highway 395 along the slopes near canyon openings.
However, westerly gusts 45 to 55 mph could reach the highway at
times creating strong crosswinds and hazardous driving
conditions...especially for high profile vehicles.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON
